title: Scientific Method and Investigation

vocab.definition: An educated guess about what will happen in an experiment
Something that can change in an experiment
Using your senses to gather information
What you learn from the results of an experiment

teachingNotes: Guide students through designing and conducting simple experiments. Emphasize the importance of fair testing and controlling variables. Practice making predictions and drawing conclusions from data.
